meta.description: Maximize the electricity flow from the Power Plant (Node 0) to the Final Distribution Center (Node 7) in a network of tunnels with given capacities.

sets.name: NODES
sets.description: Nodes in the electrical distribution network

params.name: capacity
params.description: Capacity of tunnels between nodes in thousands of kWh

vars.name: flow
vars.description: Flow of electricity between nodes in thousands of kWh

vars.name: F
vars.description: Total flow from the Power Plant (Node 0) to the Final Distribution Center (Node 7)

objective.name: maximize_total_flow
objective.description: Maximize the total electricity flow from Node 0 to Node 7

constraints.name: source_flow_balance
constraints.description: Flow balance at the source node (Node 0)

constraints.name: sink_flow_balance
constraints.description: Flow balance at the sink node (Node 7)

constraints.name: node_1_flow_conservation
constraints.description: Flow conservation at Node 1

constraints.description: Flow conservation at Node 2

constraints.description: Flow conservation at Node 4

constraints.description: Flow conservation at Node 5

constraints.name: node_6_flow_conservation
constraints.description: Flow conservation at Node 6
